Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat in Singapore (East Coast), you'll be close to Parkway Parade and Singapore Flyer. This hotel is within close proximity of Singapore Sports Hub and Singapore National Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 70 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat in Singapore (East Coast), you'll be close to Parkway Parade and Singapore Flyer. This hotel is within close proximity of Singapore Sports Hub and Singapore National Stadium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Parkway Parade - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Singapore Sports Hub - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Singapore National Stadium - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Singapore Indoor Stadium - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Kallang Wave Mall - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Air Force Museum - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Bedok Mall - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Golden Mile Complex - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Haji Lane - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
City Square Mall - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Singapore Flyer - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Mustafa Centre - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Alive Museum - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Suntec City - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Nex - 4.9 km / 3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 11 km / 6.8 mi
Batam Batu Besar (BTH-Hang Nadim) - 32.2 km / 20 mi
Johor Bahru (JHB-Senai Intl.) - 44.1 km / 27.4 mi
